title: Basic Engineering Circuit Analysis 10th c2011 Irwin txtbk
description:
Basic Engineering Circuit Analysis, 10th Edition (c2011), textbook by J. David Irwin & R. Mark Nelms.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP001813

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Basic concepts
2. Resistive circuits
3. Nodal and loop analysis techniques
4. Operational amplifiers
5. Additional analysis techniques
6. Capacitance and inductance
7. First- and second-order transient circuits
8. AC steady-state analysis
9. Steady-state power analysis
10. Magnetically coupled networks
11. Polyphase circuits
12. Variable-frequency network performance
13. The Laplace transform
14. Application of the Laplace transform to circuit analysis
15. Fourier analysis techniques
16. Two-port networks

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.

NOTA: Solution manual for the 9th edition (unfortunately large, 220 MB) available here (uploader: camelCase).
